text: Ildefons Cerdà i Sunyer (23 December 1815 – 21 August 1876) was a Catalan- Spanish urban planner, civil engineer, politician. He developed new urban theories, including the extension plan of Barcelona 19th-century. == Other websites == *Ildefons Cerdà. Personalitat i ideologia *Biography *Fifteen articles on Ildefons Cerdà, his work and its impact on the City of Barcelona, Barcelona Metropolis, Autumn 2009. title: Ildefons Cerdà
